text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Sunday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Pro-government parties call for yes vote in referendum for constitutional reform due September 13.
- French human rights delegation in two-day visit to Morocco starting September 3.
- Two French nationals sentenced to eight years imprisonment on drug charges.
- Owners of gas stations threaten to stage strike in protest against sale price which they say does not take into account world market.
